TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit Lifetime extends System.Object

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此選擇性項目會在`wst:RequestSecurityToken`或`wst:RequestSecurityTokenResponse`訊息以指出想要或需要權杖的存留期。This optional element is used in `wst:RequestSecurityToken` or `wst:RequestSecurityTokenResponse` messages to indicate the desired or required lifetime of a token. 所有的時間都是以 UTC 時間指定。All times are specified in UTC time. [!INCLUDE[wif_wstrust_ref](~/includes/wif-wstrust-ref-md.md)]

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.
